alert.note: Alert for Eastern Norton Sound and Nulato Hills (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 10 at 6:21AM AKST until January 12 at 9:00AM AKST by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 3 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 9 AM AKST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Snow, freezing rain and blowing snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 4 inches and ice accumulations of around one tenth of an inch. Winds gusting to 60 mph. Visibility one half mile or less at times. * WHERE...Eastern Norton Sound and Nulato Hills. * WHEN...From 3 PM this afternoon to 9 AM AKST Friday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. Strong winds and ice accumulation could cause damage to power lines. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The strongest winds are expected near Unalakleet. The heaviest snow and blowing snow is expected near Elim. Snow will develop this evening and continue off and on through Thursday night. Freezing rain is possible late tonight into Thursday night.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Norton Sound and Nulato Hills
